right.value: msg.value must be equal to claim deposit unit
cannot claim twice with the same address
contract is still in claim phase
deposit value must be a multiple of claim value
cannot deposit twice with the same address
deal is off as there are not enough claims. Call withdraw with you claimer address

arguments.value: address made no deposit. Note that this should be called with the public address
address made no claims. Note that this should be called with the secret address
